dmca.title: CEASE AND DESIST - DEFAMATORY MATERIAL
dmca.body:
I am writing to inform you that an Internet website which you own, administer, control, host or manage, found at http://forum.reserve-bank.com, contains statements about [Private], ("Byrne") which are knowingly and intentionally false (Refer “Annex 1”). These statements are defamatory and in violation of Australian and International laws.
Byrne has suffered damages due to your publication of this material and continues to suffer damages due to the continuing presence of these false materials on your site. I demand that you permanently any such defamatory materials within 24 hours from your receipt of this e-mail, and will not hesitate to resort to legal action to protect my interests.
Please respond to me confirming that all false and defamatory information regarding Byrne has been removed from your website, and that you have taken steps to keep such material from being published in the future. 
We look forward to these postings being taken down within 24 hours. If not, the legal process to hold you, and any associated entities, accountable for damages will proceed in the Supreme Court of Queensland, Australia on Monday morning, 30 June, at 9:00 a.m.

Sincerely, 

Annex 1 – Hyperlinks containing defamatory material
http://forum.reserve-bank.com/viewtopic.php?t=570
